name: Hear Me Out
simple_desc: Deals DMG to one designated enemy. Deals DMG to the target hit by this instance of Skill and their adjacent targets, repeating 2 times. After that, deals DMG to all enemies.
desc: Consumes 1 stack of "Inspiration." Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of The Herta's ATK to one designated enemy and inflicts #2[i] stack(s) of "Interpretation." Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of The Herta's ATK to the target hit by this instance of Skill and adjacent targets, repeating 2 times. Finally, deals Ice DMG equal to #3[i]% of The Herta's ATK to all enemies.
